import java.util.Scanner;

class TANSWTCH {
    static final int MAX_T = 200;
    static final int MAX_N = 100;

    public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception {
        Scanner sc = new Scanner(System.in);
        
        if (!sc.hasNextInt())
            throw new Exception("Wrong Input Format");

        int numTests = sc.nextInt();

        if (numTests < 1 || numTests > MAX_T)
            throw new Exception("Contraint Violated");

        while (numTests-- > 0) {
            if (!sc.hasNext())
                throw new Exception("Wrong Input Format");
            String s = sc.next();
            if (s.length() < 1 || s.length() > MAX_N)
                throw new Exception("Contraint Violated");

            int countOn = 0, countOff = 0;
            for (char c : s.toCharArray()) {
                if (c == 'O')
                    ++countOff;
                else if (c == 'N')
                    ++countOn;
                else {
                    throw new Exception("Invalid Character");
                }
            }

            int ans = countOff;
            int prefOff = 0, prefOn = 0;
            for (char c : s.toCharArray()) {
                if (c == 'O')
                    ++prefOff;
                else
                    ++prefOn;

                ans = Math.min(ans, prefOn + (countOff - prefOff));
            }            
            System.out.println(ans);   
        }
    }
}
